name: Waiter Tray
description:
Don't break the golden wine bottle or you'll be fired! Try to maintain the balance of the tray by placing other bottles and glasses on it.

Highscores

Service provided by globalstats.io

Highscores hosted on https://globalstats.io/leaderboard/624a0eeb5f5e8834a18b47b2

How to play

Place objects on the tray to maintain balance as long as you can. If the golden bottle falls from the tray the game is over. Every object has 4 seconds to be placed, or it will place itself! Each object placed increases the place cooldown.

Controls

-> rotate camera - A, D keys

-> choose place position - mouse

-> place object - left click

Credits

All coding and 3D models by me

Highscore service and GlobalstatsIO.cs server communication script by Globalstats Team (https://github.com/globalstats-io/unity-library)
